name: LiveLeak - Darken for night viewing.
description: Darkens the webpage theme used on liveleak so it can be viewed without causing or aggravating myopia. Specifically switches backgrounds to black and text to off-white or slightly grey in color.
additional_info: This CSS file is offered on userstyles.org with a CC0 license which means you can use it, and modify it for any purpose without accreditation.
